alert.note: Alert for Black Mesa Area; Chinle Valley; Kaibab Plateau; Marble and Glen Canyons; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas Hwy 264 Northward (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 08 at 3:12AM MST until August 08 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM MST /NOON MDT/ THIS MORNING TO 8 PM MST /9 PM MDT/ THIS EVENING FOR FAR NORTHERN PORTIONS OF COCONINO, NAVAJO AND APACHE COUNTIES... * AFFECTED AREA...Locations near Chinle, Fredonia, Jacob Lake, Kayenta, Page and Shonto. This includes portions of the Kaibab National Forest. * WINDS...West through southwest winds 15 to 25 mph, with gusts up to 40 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...Ranging from the single digits near Page to the mid teens on the Kaibab Plateau. * IMPACTS...The combination of gusty winds and low humidity can cause fire to rapidly grow in size and intensity before first responders can contain them.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring or are imminent. A combination of strong winds and low relative humidities can contribute to extreme fire behavior. Please notify field crews of this Red Flag Warning.

area.areaDesc: Black Mesa Area; Chinle Valley; Kaibab Plateau; Marble and Glen Canyons; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas Hwy 264 Northward
